entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
